name: Toaster Toaster Meltdown
description:
TOASTER TOASTER Meltdown

It’s your first week of work at the nuclear power plant. Good news! It’s finally Friday, and you are in early to have your morning toast in peace before any of your new colleagues arrive at work.

The bad news is that your Wi-Fi enabled smart toaster has triggered an unstoppable meltdown in the reactor core. Oops! You have to move quickly, grab your toaster and get out of there before anyone notices that you’ve just ruined their Pizza Friday.

Controls: WSAD to move, E to interact, Mouse to look
